I visited Mongolia again last week during Summer season, it was nice. Summer is the warmest season and the best season to travel to Mongolia. The summer can be unpredictable, sometimes it gets really hot but then it can be rainy for several days.

This time, I have follow-up from previous meeting [early this year](/blog/20190126-extreme-winter-in-mongolia) with NEMA, NAMEM, NSO, ALAGAC and MercyCorps.
